hadith.text: Hafsah, daughter of AbdurRahman ibn AbuBakr, reported on the authority of her father:The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said to AbdurRahman: AbdurRahman, put your sister Aisha on the back of the camel behind you and make her perform umrah from at-Tan'im. When you come down from the hillock (in at-Tan'im), she must wear (ihram for umrah), for this is an umrah accepted (by Allah)
